mean_cn: adj. 省的；地方性的；偏狭的；  n. 地方人民；乡下人；外地人
mean_en: connected with one of the large areas that some countries are divided into, with its own local government
sentence: Toronto is the provincial capital of Ontario province.
sentence_trans: 多伦多是安大略省的省会城市。
word_etyma: provinc=province省 + ial有……的 → provincial偏狭的，地方性的
